candidates.title: feat: Simplify and adapt `native core`
candidates.body:
Depends on https://github.com/marc2332/freya/pull/535
Closes https://github.com/marc2332/freya/issues/482

- [x] Simplify `TextNode`
- [x] Use Enums to store the `tag`, `attributes` and `listeners` in `ElementNode` and other String fields in `OwnedAttributeDiscription`
- [x] Remove `namespace` where possible
- [x] Remove Custom Elements (?)
- [x] Not storing Node states for Text nodes as they are not used in freya
- [x] Remove listeners from text nodes
    -  Tips from Evan:
       - https://github.com/DioxusLabs/dioxus/blob/c518c91c4c001639a24f8d88f4e1c7c78dc2eff6/packages/native-core/src/dioxus.rs#L116-L120
       - https://github.com/DioxusLabs/dioxus/blob/master/packages/native-core/src/real_dom.rs#L315-L384

candidates.title: feat: Bump Dioxus and fork native-core and native-core-macro
candidates.body:
Currently blocked by https://github.com/DioxusLabs/dioxus/pull/2069 and https://github.com/DioxusLabs/dioxus/pull/2055

Also forks `native-core` and `native-core-macro` crates from Dioxus, context: https://github.com/marc2332/freya/issues/482

candidates.title: feat: `content` attribute
candidates.body: Constrain cross axis unsized bounds to the biggest inner element.

candidates.title: feat: Bump Dioxus and clean up dependencies
feat: Testing improvements
candidates.body:
## Changes
- New `TestNode::is_visible()`
- Splitted `TestNode::layout()` in `TestNode::area()` and `TestNode::layout()`
- New `TestHandler::cursor_icon()`
- New `TestHandler::sdom()`
- New `TestNode::children_ids()`
- Moved the root candidate resolution to Torin itself (apparently that improves the perf of the cached benchmarks (free win!))
- And added a lot of new tests

candidates.title: feat: Revamp of `use_animation`
candidates.body: This new hook will replace `use_animation` and `use_animation_transition`

candidates.title: feat: Reduce deps
candidates.body:
Depends on https://github.com/marc2332/freya/pull/346

reduce deps from 468 to 411, at least on Windows

candidates.title: docs: Improve docs and fix errors in doctests
candidates.body:
This "builds on" https://github.com/marc2332/freya/pull/434. That PR fixed only the doctests (Rust code snippets) in the main crate docs though. This PR fixes every single code snippet and makes `cargo test --workspace --doc` pass. This command is also added to the workflow.

There's cca. 130 "new" (fixed and passing) doctests. All of them needed imports, but a lot of them didn't compile for other reasons. Other times, they compiled, but they were wrong in a different way (e.g. `max_lines.md` had a code snippet that was using `line_height`).

Additionally, the `freya_elements` docs were expanded in some cases (remove ambiguity, specify details), standardized (e.g. all examples are grouped under an example heading, previously some examples had just a plaintext `Example:` "title"), and fixed (link fixes, typos, etc.).
